args: You're off on a survey of Alberia's\nbeaches, you say?
Indeed. As an island nation, Hinomoto is\nsusceptible to floods. I wish to observe\nhow others have responded to this issue.
Seeing their solutions and applying those\nlessons in new policy will be a true test of\nmy abilities. It also requires that I travel.
As such, I would ask you to watch\nover these lands in my absence.\nWill you do me this kindness?
I would keep your domain safe at any cost.
Thank you, and pardon the imposition.
It's no trouble at all, my lord. Besides, a\ntrip to the shoreline with no cumbersome\nentourage sounds like a fine opportunity.
You're always so buried in work. I hope\nyou'll take this chance to unwind a little.
At the very least, I will endeavor to bring\nyou home an entertaining story or three.
Even I'm not so intractable as to refrain\nfrom ALL of summer's myriad delights.\nHeh... Here's to a fruitful journey.
That melancholy mien of his...\nIt's enough to make me swoon!
Right? I'd love to get to know him better,\nbut my knees quake at the thought of so\nmuch as saying a friendly ＂hello.＂
It's been three days, and the few meager\nscraps of information we've gleaned have\nbeen sandwiched between fête after fête.
The local lord's going all-out. You heard\nhis whole spiel about giving you a suitable\nreception as an honored guest and all that.
And I appreciate his kindness. But I came\nto observe the systems in place here for\nmyself, and to learn what I can from them.
Not to peer at the sea through a telescope\nwhile swilling cocktails with socialites.\nAnd yet...
The butler they have watching us seems\ndead-set on corralling us within the manor\npremises.
My aspirations for this trip grow less\nattainable by the second...
We could always write off the rest of\nthe trip and just party till we leave.
No. My duties as wyrmclan leader demand\nmore of me than that. I must survey the\nsite for myself, whatever it takes. And so—
I propose a jailbreak! Er, partybreak?
A ＂partybreak...＂ Ha ha! So droll.\nIf that isn't you in a nutshell, Ieyasu.
Well? Got an escape plan in mind yet?
I'm still thinking... Or, more to the point,\nI'm not acquainted enough with the lay of\nthe land to formulate a proper strategy.
Which leaves only a full-frontal assault,\nI fear. Will you lend me your strength,\nMarishiten?
Does a boar defecate in the woods?\nI'll draw the butler's attention for a bit.\nSlip out while his back is turned.
As ever, I am in your debt.\nNow... Let us begin!
Phew... I managed to make it this far\nwhile our little ＂sentry＂ was distracted\nby the sudden explosion. Thank you.
No prob. I don't mind a good party, but I\nwas getting bored to tears back th—
So THERE you are, Lord Ieyasu!\nCome, let us return to the party, sir.
Guh! He actually chased us down?!\nThis guy is nuts!
Rgh... If we're caught here, we may not\nsoon get another chance. But how to—?
Hey! You two! What's wrong? You on the\nrun? Is it 'cause one of you's a dragon?
Huh? Er...yes. You see, I've a surveying\nmission I must complete, but it requires\nme to escape from that butler.
I don't really follow, but meh. Whatever.
You seem pretty desperate. I'll show you\na way out if you buy me a shaved ice.
Great! Follow me. And you better hold up\nyour end of the bargain!
*huff* *huff* We definitely left him in\nthe dust this time... Right?
Relax. I took you through a buncha\nalleyways only a local would know.\nThat guy's miles away by now.
That's a relief. Now I can finally get some\nreal work done. Though, I must say...

We got shaved ice! We got noodles!
You want both? We even got shoodles!
...Okay, I made that last one up, but
whatever you need, we got it here!
Ooh, I hear there's a pack of seals over\nthere. Let's see if we can sneak a peek!
Beach volleyball's not some GAME! I want\nto see blood, sweat, and tears, people!
This place is so lively! I suppose I should\nexpect nothing less of Fellista Beach, it\nbeing one of Alberia's top resort spots.
Huh... Everybody's as carefree as can be.\nMust not be much crime here.
Making it an ideal spot for my survey.
But where to begin? I'll confess I'm\nsomething of a stranger to resorts.
Sheltered much? Between that and your\nfancy vocab, I'm guessing you're some\nkinda fancy diplomat?
Something like that, yes. My mission is to\nobserve the workings of Fellista Beach and\nlearn what I can from them this summer.
And that begins with creating a full picture\nof what one does here at the shore.
Huh. Well, if you need a tour guide,\nI can be your guy.

Meh, why not? Summer break gets boring
after a while. Besides, I feel like you'd end
up face-first in a trash can or something if
I let you wander around all slack-jawed.
It'll cost you extra, though. Namely, fresh\njuice and a crepe with the works on top.
Of course. I shall gladly compensate you\nfor your time and expertise. Having a local\nto guide me would be invaluable.
It's a done deal. Guess we'll be seeing\na lot of each other this summer, uh...\nSorry, didn't catch your name. I'm Setta.
Ah! How rude of me. I am Ieyasu,\nand this is my pactbound dragon,\nMarishiten.
Whoa, you've got a pact with a dragon?!\nYou are CRACKED, my guy.
Ha ha. I am unsure how that makes me...\nfractured, was it? But I look forward to our\ntime together, young Setta!
